name: Stick Spider Crime City Rescue
description:
The stickman spider game design for those people who love to play with super powers heroes and rescue the people that are trap in flaming buildings or rescue them from city criminal gangsters. Use your rope heroes skills and kill the criminals that are trying to rob the banks. You will see the life story of the criminal gangster and street criminal people who involves in different city crimes, so go and start your fight against criminal gangster and wins that battle. The adventure is between two groups of criminal people that will hijack the whole city then stickman spider hero take charge of this criminal city and save the innocent people from gangster. You will show your fighting moves like punching skills and martial arts moves or use flying rope functionality to take adventurous fun. The stickman hero fight start with a street gangster and other criminals. The life of a street gangster is totally full of bad and involves in different city crimes and that are trying to rob the people from supermarket, city bank etc. The people of the city are worried about the criminal gangster.

** Key Feature **
• Save the people from the criminal gangster and be the stickman hero
• Kills the lot of street gangster or fight with bosses
• Stickman hero attack on the city gangs and win that fight
• Amazing new tricks for catching the gangster
